places.generalDescription: Gurney Paragon Mall in Penang is a haven for fashion enthusiasts and beauty aficionados, offering a wide array of upscale makeup, perfumes, skincare products, and designer labels. Situated by the serene sea with St. Joseph's Novitiate chapel nearby, the mall boasts an impressive lineup of top brand outlets, chic boutiques, trendy salons, an IMAX movie theatre, and outdoor dining spots.

sources.snippet: Also set along the extensive Gurney Drive, this shopping mall is the higher-end, less crowded version of Gurney Plaza ‚Äî which incidentally is only a two-minute walk away. With over 40 retail fashion stores, 30 eateries, a TGV cinema, a Times bookstore, and one of the most successful fitness centers in Penang, this shopping mall will please your palate, senses, and running shoes.
sources.shortName: The 5 Best Malls In Penang Malaysia

sources.snippet: Gurney Paragon Mall is considered the best shopping mall in Penang with a mixture of many different fashion trends here. Located along the Persiaran Gurney area, Gurney Paragon Mall is considered a huge-scale beachfront complex with more than 40 fashion stores and 30 restaurants gathered here. However, what makes Gurney Paragon Mall unique is that this entire 700,000 square meter complex is built around St Joseph‚Äôs Novitiate Heritage Building, a 2-storey chapel built in 1925, has now been restored and integrated into the layout of the mall‚Äôs expansion plan.

places.name: Gurney Paragon Mall

reviews.text:
Gurney Paragon Mall ‚Äì Penang

This is one of the more upscale malls in Penang, and it has a very modern and spacious design with high ceilings and plenty of natural light, which makes walking around quite pleasant.

üõçÔ∏è Shopping & Stores
The mall leans more toward premium and lifestyle brands, including fashion, beauty, and skincare. If you're looking for high-end retail, perfumes, or makeup, this is one of the better spots in Penang. There are also a good mix of restaurants, caf√©s, and dessert places scattered across different levels.

üç¥ Food & Dining
While it doesn't have as large a food court as some other malls (like Gurney Plaza next door), the dining options here are carefully curated. You'll find a nice selection of international cuisines, as well as trendy caf√©s for coffee and desserts.

üé≠ Atmosphere & Events
The mall often hosts seasonal decorations and events - for example, the photo shows a festive setup near the central atrium. The wide open space in the middle makes it a good venue for exhibitions, promotions, and cultural shows.

üöó Accessibility
The mall is wheelchair accessible, with wide walkways and elevators. Parking is available but can get busy during weekends, so weekdays are more comfortable if you prefer a quieter experience.

‚ú® Overall
Compared to Gurney Plaza, which is more crowded and caters to a wider range of budgets, Gurney Paragon feels a bit more refined and spacious, making it a good place if you prefer a calmer shopping experience with premium brands.

Gurney Paragon Mall blends modern shopping with heritage charm, offering a spacious layout and a unique architectural experience. The selection of stores and dining options is decent, though some areas feel underutilized due to vacant units. Overall, it's a pleasant place for a relaxed visit, especially if you enjoy quieter malls with character.

Gurney Paragon Mall in Penang is a modern shopping destination that seamlessly blends heritage with contemporary design. The mall is built around the historic St. Jo's building, adding a unique charm to its ambiance. With a wide range of high-end boutiques, international brands, and local stores, it caters to diverse shopping preferences. The dining options are impressive, featuring everything from casual eateries to fine dining restaurants. The food court offers a variety of cuisines at reasonable prices.

Additionally, the mall hosts regular events and promotions, making each visit exciting. The spacious layout and clean environment enhance the shopping experience, while the friendly staff provide excellent customer service.

Whether you're looking to shop, dine, or simply relax, Gurney Paragon Mall offers a delightful experience for all visitors.

places.generalDescription: Gurney Plaza is a modern shopping complex located in the popular Gurney Drive promenade in Penang. Situated about three kilometers northwest of Georgetown, it stands as one of the largest and most prominent malls on the island. With nine floors of retail space, this destination offers an array of shops ranging from clothing and electronics to accessories. Additionally, visitors can enjoy various dining options including Cara Caro Cafe, The Sugar Tang, and MiniMelts ice cream.

Gurney Plaza is a nine-storey shopping complex with two levels of basement comprising nine floors of retail space from Basement 1 to the 7th floor and car park spaces at the two basement levels, the 4th to 8th floor and on the rooftop.

reviews.text:
This mall has almost everything that you might need. From pharmacy, snack and coffee, supermarket, clothing, food court, even fitness, sport, pet shop.

This is one of the most popular shopping mall in Penang. It has been around for a long time, yet it is still very popular now. reviews.text: This shopping center has a unique charm housed in an older building that gives it character. You can really feel the history as you explore the shops inside. What I loved most was the atmosphere outside-especially in the boat parking area. The view of the marina and the sea from this side is breathtaking, and the music playing at night adds a wonderful touch. You'll also find all the major clothing brands and a great selection of restaurants here. It's a perfect spot for tourists to visit in the evening, and I highly recommend checking it out for a memorable experience.

The Shopping center is small , not many stotre and restaurant  but  the mall is unique , we can see beach and yacht.
Please come here and take a nice picture .
Quiet mall cater for more upscale patrons. Not much happening and crowd on Thursday noon time. Prefer to go to Gurney Plaza since the shops there are cater to common folks.

places.generalDescription: Straits Quay is a unique shopping destination in Penang, offering stunning sea views while you shop. The mall features a variety of retail shops, with a focus on nail spas, hair spas, and boutiques. Visitors can enjoy walking or jogging along the promenade, which offers breathtaking sunrise and sunset views. It's also a popular spot for locals to bring their dogs for some outdoor fun. Additionally, the area boasts high-end residential compounds and a scenic green space known as Straits Green.

places.name: Straits Quay

reviews.text: Straits Quay in Penang is such a beautiful spot to enjoy the sea and marina views. The scenery is peaceful yet vibrant, with cozy caf√©s and restaurants along the waterfront. It almost feels like being in London or Europe with its charming atmosphere. A perfect place for photos, evening walks, and relaxing by the sea.
The view is nice and there are a lot of restaurants. Aside from that, there are no other activities though. Only a few people in the mall.

Straits Quay is the go‚Äëto waterfront marina hub in Penang, and it delivered a pleasant mix of relaxation and modern charm. Arriving in the late afternoon, we were greeted by a breezy boardwalk lined with boats gently bobbing in the marina and a backdrop of leafy hills-it was a calming contrast to the hustle of George Town.

The boulevard is dotted with an array of cafes, bistros, and boutiques selling everything from sea salt caramels and local teas to nautical-themed home d√©cor. We popped into a cozy caf√© for coffee while overlooking the yachts-comfortable chairs, friendly staff, and a relaxed vibe made it a great spot to unwind after a day of sightseeing.

A little further along, there were family-friendly restaurants, a boutique grocery, and even a wine bar with outdoor seating that felt perfect for a sundowner. Fitness enthusiasts will appreciate the waterfront jogging path, and kids were happily watching boats, feeding fish, and enjoying the wide open spaces.

The overall mood was upscale without feeling stuffy-a great place to stroll, people-watch, and take in sea views. It wasn't packed, but definitely had enough buzz to feel vibrant. If you're looking for a refreshing evening by the water or a relaxed weekend outing, Straits Quay is worth the drive.

places.address: Seri Tanjung Pinang, 10470 Tanjung Bungah, Penang, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: Penang Times Square is a multi-purpose complex located in the heart of George Town, Malaysia. It features a 6-floor mall with an array of retail stores, restaurants, beauty salons, and services. The development project also includes a residential tower and office block. Visitors can explore clothing boutiques, tech outlets, and various dining options within the mall. Additionally, the complex houses popular dance clubs like Soju Room and M2 for those looking to enjoy Penang's nightlife.

sources.snippet: Located right in the heart of Georgetown, this central hub is the outcome of a development project that comprises of a mall, residential tower and office block. You can expect to find clothing boutiques, mani-pedi parlours, tech outlets and eatery chains. If you‚Äôre looking to have a few drinks and take in the night scene in Penang, do check out Soju Room and M2, the two of the island‚Äôs most popular dance clubs, conveniently positioned at the basement of Penang Times Square.
sources.shortName: 7 shopping malls in Penang every shopaholic should visit

sources.snippet: Penang Times Square is a mixed development project comprising a mall, residential tower and office block. The mall has 3 floors that consist of clothing boutiques, nail parlours, tech stores, a museum and beauty salons, plus a few restaurants. You are able to find the main few local brands such as MTM Boutique, Asadi Concept Stores and shoe chain, Opera here in Penang Times Square Mall.
sources.shortName: Top 10+ Shopping Malls to Lease in Penang

sources.snippet:
Source:
 Photo 
by Wikimedia Commons user
*angys* 
used under CC BY-SA 4.0. Inspired by the legendary Times Square in New York, Penang Times Square is not a shopping mall in the traditional sense of the word but are tons of shops and shopping spaces around the area. The development is relatively new but there are already many plans in the works for this area.
sources.shortName: Top 9 Shopping Malls In George Town, Malaysia

sources.snippet: Penang Times Square is a shopping center in the heart of Georgetown, within walking distance of KOMTAR, Prangin Mall and 1st Avenue mall. Penang Times Square is an urban centre which also contains a mix of commercial and residential properties. There are 178 shops in total, including many restaurants and bars.
sources.shortName: Shopping malls at Penang Island in Malaysia

places.name: Penang Times Square

reviews.text:
THERE IS A VEGETARIAN OUTLET WITHIN THIS SHOPPING MALL!!!

Location:
- Located @ Penang Time Square (Shopping mall)
- Unit: 79-1-7
- At the end of the Food Court

Customer Service:
- Decent
- Dishes come quite fast even though there are huge order before us.

Taste wise:
- Kinda Salty for most of the dishes that shown in this album
- Lower ur expectation before start trying the dishes

Overall:
- Able to let u feel filling after eating!
- Will consider to come if i am in this shopping mall next time round!

This place is literally dead. I was here around 1900, not a single shop opens nor any shop is still in business. Only the outer areas are still running with restaurants. Save your time and don't think about to come here if you want to do any shopping.

This Penang time square indeed not as crowded as New York time square but at here is wide enough place to enjoy city view peacefully. So many indoor tenant at likes general shopping mall but what I like is outdoor field of this time square wide enough to enjoy the view, clean and near with roadside foodstall that place in neat. So much people do self portrait cause of the the view surround area.

places.address: 144, Jalan Dato Keramat, Georgetown, 10150 George Town, Penang, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: M Mall, located in Penang Times Square, is a trendy retail destination that opened in 2015 and has quickly become a popular shopping spot. With over 3000 stores offering health, beauty, fashion, and electronic gadgets, visitors can indulge in a diverse shopping experience. The mall also boasts a wide range of dining options to cater to different tastes. Its four stories are adorned with replicas and murals of iconic landmarks from around the country.

sources.snippet: Here in M Mall 020, they have over 3000 stores catering to health, beauty, fashion and even electronic gadget stores. Visitors also get to enjoy a wide variety of dining options ranging from familiar favourites to new gastronomic experiences. Location: Jalan Dato Keramat, 10150 George Town, Pulau PinangOpening hours: Open Daily 10:00 AM-10:00PMContact: 04-371 3333
sources.shortName: Top 10+ Shopping Malls to Lease in Penang

sources.snippet:
Source:
 Photo 
by Wikimedia Commons user
*angys* 
used under CC BY-SA 4.0. Located in Penang Times Square, the beautiful new M Mall Penang opened in 2015 and is one of the hottest shopping spots in the city. There are over 500 retail outlets in the mall and four stories worth of decoration promoting and showcasing different landmarks and icons of the country.
sources.shortName: Top 9 Shopping Malls In George Town, Malaysia

places.name: M Mall

reviews.text: Nowadays has a lot of varieties of products. Not crowded on weekdays. Enjoy shopping here. Some of products are reasonable price. If u have its company points..U will worth it to shop here ,50% point n 50% card /cash. Friendly staffs.

Great place if you like your bars and drinks, but don't drink the cocktails as they are full of syrup and horrible. Just stick to beer and wine. Food is mainly western but you can get some local treats here too and McDonald's is also located here as well as a multiple story shopping mall full of various interesting stores. Worth a visit and there are also local shopping malls within 5 to 10 minutes walk of this one too.

Luxury building but doesn't have the best and important brands like Starbucks, Mac Cosmetics, Dior, Nars, LV,  between others. I didn't like even one of the stores inside.
Very cool air conditioned, free but no so good wifi.
Nice decorated.
Almost empty at 20:00.
Many places for eat, little expensive do.

places.address: Jalan Dato Keramat, 10150 George Town, Penang, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: Gama Supermarket & Departmental Store is a multi-floor emporium offering groceries, household supplies, clothing, electronics, and more. The supermarket boasts top-notch quality produce and a well-organized layout for easy navigation. Meanwhile, the departmental store features a food court on the 7th floor that offers convenience and a variety of dining options.

sources.snippet: Image Credit: Gama Supermarket & Departmental Store Wikipedia. Penang houses the oldest supermarket in Malaysia!. Gama Supermarket & Departmental Store, which opened in 1967, carries the memories of many Penang people.
sources.shortName: Penang Shopping Mall: 2024 Best Shopping Mall In Penang List

places.name: Gama Supermarket & Departmental Store

reviews.text: Seems to be the largest departmental store (5 storeys) plus a supermarket within the old town district. A good place for shopping, especially for some  shopping supermarket stuffs, without the need to travel out by grab to those shopping malls outside, eg. Queensbay mall, Gurney Plaza and Gurney Paragon Mall, etc.

This supermarket has a really old-school vibe and is very popular with locals in Georgetown. I think it's because the grocery prices here are more affordable compared to newer shopping malls. The 1st floor is for daily groceries and food, while the upper floors are for clothing and hardware. There's also a bakery at the front door, so you can smell the fragrant bakery aroma as you step in the entrance.
Good supermarket with plenty of choice products ranging from local to internationally sourced visiting and branded goods. Prices are reasonable and service was very good

places.address: Wisma Gama, No.1, Jalan Dato Keramat, 10150 George Town, Pulau Pinang, Malaysia

sources.snippet: The mall aims to ensure customers enjoy their shopping and draw in people who visit this area. Furthermore, they have some well-known stores like Chateraise, Xing Fu Tang, and Mr. DIY. Image Credit: City Junction Penang
sources.shortName: Top 15 Most Popular Shopping Mall In Penang

places.name: City Junction Penang

reviews.text: I,My mother and My grandmother try to food first‚Ä¶ my grandmother said to dim sum not more much so her unhappy and upset because of her like dim sum more much.. but food taste‚Ä¶ My mother said to delicious prawns‚Ä¶ your staff good fast job and helping‚Ä¶üòä God's blessings.. thank you so much‚Ä¶

A Good Spot of Penang City centre with good cafes and condominiums annexed with this same place . Just for relaxation I can go with this mall with minimal shops There are still more shops to come but it's empty from floor one . Situated opposite to the island plaza and 10 precinct.

Located at Tanjung Tokong area right in front of Precient 10, City Junction has a similar concept to Moulmein Rise located Pulau Tikus. Its not ideally consider as a shopping mall but a integrated commercial development project with high rise residential condominium.
There are various tenants but its getting quite for awhile, anchor tenant is Village Grocer and the rest is mostly service based and F&B establishment. The tenant choice selection does provide an interesting opportunity as there is Taco Bell, Hut Dining Buffet (Japanese style dining buffet), Wagyu Rice (Japanese restaurant specialising in Wagyu beef), Chateraise Pastry bakery (Japanese style bakery), CU Korean Mart and health boost Juice. The environment could be quite on certain days especially on weekdays and there are more customer /foot traffic on the weekends. Overall its consider to be purely a neighbourhood retail outlet. There is also MRDIY, a gym located inside the premises.

places.address: 2, Persiaran Lengkuas 2, Tanjung Tokong, 10470 George Town, Penang, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: All Seasons Place is a popular shopping mall in Penang, situated on the outskirts of the city. Along with a variety of retailers and restaurants, the mall also has a supermarket. The mall's relaxed atmosphere and attractive facilities make it suitable for family gatherings, friends' get-togethers, and business meetings. The staff are friendly and efficient, making it easy to order food and drinks.

sources.snippet: All Seasons Place provides a variety of shops, including a supermarket, fashion stores, and restaurants. This is why it‚Äôs a well-liked mall among both local residents and international visitors. Its modern design also adds to its appeal, making customers feel comfortable and satisfied.
sources.shortName: Top 15 Most Popular Shopping Mall In Penang

places.name: All Seasons Place

reviews.text:
We love having tea and their simple food here. The teas were soothing, calming and simply refreshing.
Good ambience, relaxed environment and soothing lighting with music to go with your lunch or dinner.
Friendly and efficient staff to serve and to take care of your need aka food order and so forth.
Suitable gathering for family, friends, colleagues, acquaintances and relatives.
Nice place with supermarket and lots of food options

PLEASE DO NOT EAT INSIDE THE GYM!

I'm not sure if he was a video editor or a staff member, but he was eating two boxes of food at the table next to the door. üôÑ I tolerated him finishing the first one, but then he took out another box with a very strong smell.
Anytime fitness everything is good, but how can someone eat inside a gym?

Ermm,The cleaning lady's attitude was also very bad.

places.address: 6H-1-21, All Seasons Place, Lebuh Thean Teik, Air Itam, 11500 George Town, Penang, Malaysia

places.generalDescription: Nestled within the iconic KOMTAR building, the ICT Digital Mall is a vibrant hub for tech enthusiasts and casual shoppers alike. Spanning four floors, this bustling mall features over 250 shops dedicated to all things electronic‚Äîfrom cutting-edge smartphones to essential computer hardware and software solutions. Whether you're on the hunt for brand-new gadgets or looking to score a deal on second-hand items, there's something for everyone here.

sources.snippet: The ICT Digital Mall is a sprawling 4-story podium that hosts over 250 shop lots of computer hardware and software solutions. Attached to the iconic KOMTAR building and linked to 1 st Avenue and Prangin Mall, you‚Äôll find a dizzying array of the latest electronic gadgets and repair shops. This mall sells second-hand optionsalongside brand-new gadgets too, just be sure to shop around to get the best bargain before you make a commitment.
sources.shortName: Go-To Shopping Malls In Penang (Even If You Just Like To Window Shop)

sources.snippet: Next to Prangin Mall and connected via an elevated walkway, ICT Digital Mall @KOMTAR is where one goes for ‚Äî you guessed it ‚Äî electronics, computers, smartphones and so on. There are a couple of second-hand stores here where you can buy spare parts or get a cheaper, refurbished computer, cheap laptop and phone covers. Also, it‚Äôs the only place I know of in Penang where you can dispose of electronic parts and spent batteries.
sources.shortName: The 10 Best Penang Shopping Malls to Visit in 2024

sources.snippet: Over time the mall lost its edge over competitor malls like Gurney Plaza and Prangin Mall (the latter is located right opposite of KOMTAR). In recent years the mall has been revitalized and after huge renovations the mall is now again starting to become more and more popular. Currently the main attraction is ICT@Komtar; a big IT mall within the complex.
sources.shortName: Shopping malls at Penang Island in Malaysia

sources.snippet: ICT Digital Mall @ Komtar has various brands of digital products including Vivo, Oppo, Lenovo, Acer, etc. Moreover, they have electrical appliances. Additionally, many people come here when they want to buy a computer, hairdryer, or fan.
sources.shortName: Penang Shopping Mall: 2024 Best Shopping Mall In Penang List

places.name: ICT Digital Mall @ Komtar

reviews.text:
Awesome, friendly, üëçüèª good experience.

The seller/staffs here serve the needs of consumers excellently,
taking care of my old cellphone with great love and working neatly, beautifully, the best ideas and suggestions for our daily device needs.

Thank you for the great services.

Sarahüíê‚úçüèª
You can find a lot of electronic and gadget items here. There are so many stores here you just need to choose which store you want to buy your items.

The Mall was absolutely wonderful, from customer service to the latest tech devices, very pleasing. We especially have no time left to go other places as the mall was quite big and a lot of options either custom build pc's or factory build also the special of this mal is their prices,  some shops offer negotiable as well. And i have purchased a customized gaming Pc with a very good price.

places.address: L3-30, ICT KOMTAR, Jln Penang, 10000 George Town, Penang, Malaysia
